climbs.name: Wolf Pack
climbs.fa: Rich and Susan Strang, Wolf Riehle

content.description: Start at left side of wall and climb easy slab to small roof. continue over the roof with good hand holds but very bad feet. The climbing eases some after the 6th bolt and you move slightly right. Finish on the black slab passing 2 more bolts sharing some of the holds to get to the anchors of Wolf In Sheeps Clothing.
content.protection: 8 bolts to shared anchor with Wolf Pack
content.location: Left of the Wolf In Sheeps Clothing corner and black slab. Starts below a small roof above at around the 30 foot height.

content.description: Start below the left facing corner and black face at a vertical wall. Climb the vertical face to some easy slab moves that gain the prominent left facing corner. Climb the black slab and corner with increasingly more difficult moves to a tricky exit then move just before the chains.
content.protection: 7 bolts to chain anchor and lowering biners at top of corner.
content.location: On the far left side of the wall where the trail meets the cliff. There is a prominent left facing corner and black slab up high which marks the location.

content.description: This is the first wall that you approach when getting to Gotham City. It is the only east facing cliff (northeast facing actually) in the area and receives early morning sun in the spring (around March and on). It also stays in shade throughout the entire days which is another important factor as the days get longer and warmer in the spring.
